game.name: Rest In Paws
game.categories: Single-player, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound
game.shortDescription: Explore the touching story of Kebab, a rural cat, as she copes with grief following her passing from old age. Delve into her world and discover the story of her life, from her adoption by a loving family to the meaningful recollections that shaped her being.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore the touching story of Kebab, a rural cat, as she copes with grief following her passing from old age. Delve into her world and discover the story of her life, from her adoption by a loving family to the meaningful recollections that shaped her being.
